D

decodeBase64(List<String>) - Static method in class com.rli.connectors.changeevent.ChangeEventUtils
Retrieves a list containing the value of each element decoded in Base 64.
decrypt(LDAPAttribute) - Static method in class com.rli.slapd.server.LDAPAttribute
Decrypt attibute Here is how the decryption works: 1) if the value does not start with "{}", no change; 2) if the value does start with "{}", then it is assumed that BASE64 encoded string follows.
decrypt(LDAPEntry, Collection<String>) - Static method in class com.rli.slapd.server.LDAPEntry

Deletes an existing entry.
DELETE - Static variable in class com.rli.slapd.server.LDAPModification
Specifies that a value should be removed from an attribute.
deleteAllValues() - Method in class com.rli.slapd.server.LDAPAttribute
 
deleteTree(String) - Static method in class com.rli.ldap.util.FIDOperationsClientUtil
Deletes the specified entry and all of its descendants (the entire sub-tree starting from the specified DN).

DN_ESCAPED_CHAR - Static variable in class com.rli.slapd.server.LDAPDN
Array of the characters that may be escaped in a DN.
dnBackslashDeNormalizer(String) - Static method in class com.rli.slapd.server.LDAPDN
 
dnNormalizer(String) - Static method in class com.rli.slapd.server.LDAPDN
Normalize dn by: 1) Remove extra write space; 2) LDAPv2 to LDAPv3 For Example: ou= "One, Two, Three, GO!" , o = radiant logic and always return the following: ou=\"One\, Two\, Three\, GO!\",o=radiant logic
doConnect(ConnString2) - Method in class com.rli.ldapclient.LDAPOperations2
Establishes a connection to the LDAP server specified in the given connection string object.
doConnect(VDQuery) - Method in class com.rli.ldapclient.LDAPOperations2
Establishes a connection to the LDAP server specified in the given VDQuery object (representation of an LDAP URL).
doConnect(String, String, String) - Method in class com.rli.ldapclient.LDAPOperations2
Establishes a connection using simple authentication (bind DN and password) to the LDAP server specified in the given LDAP URL.

Establishes a connection using simple authentication (bind DN and password) to the LDAP server specified in the given LDAP URL.
doConnect(String, String, String, Vector<LDAPControl[]>, boolean, boolean) - Method in class com.rli.ldapclient.LDAPOperations2
Establishes a connection using simple authentication (bind DN and password) to the LDAP server specified in the given LDAP URL.

Establishes a connection to the LDAP server specified in the given LDAP URL.
doDisconnect() - Method in class com.rli.ldapclient.LDAPOperations2
Disconnects and closes the current LDAP connection.
doVDSConnect() - Method in class com.rli.ldapclient.LDAPOperations2
Establishes a connection to the local FID server (this uses the connection information from the special "vds" data source that points to the local FID server).
doVDSConnect(String) - Method in class com.rli.ldapclient.LDAPOperations2
Establishes a connection to the local FID server (this uses the connection information from the special "vds" data source that points to the local FID server).

currentRepo.name: idm
currentRepo.description: Integrates identity data: contextual, dynamic, and consistent data for administrative and access decisions.
